main: ^Sorry if I startled you, but nobody ever comes to visit me except the Mayor before he goes home to his second story apartment.
^Ooops. You didn't hear that from me.
^I'm not really supposed to be this close to the city, sharks usually are too feared to be allowed in town.
^Everybody thinks that I'm a monster, just because I'm a shark! How messed up is that?
^I promise I'd never hurt a thing though! I don't even like the taste of fish.
^... Oh man. Please don't tell anybody you found me here. I'll get in big trouble.
